title: Drawing, "Sidechair"
medium:
graphite, red color pencil, ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Large stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 501 MADISON AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions, instructions Inscribed in graphite at center right: #30 Inscribed in red color pencil at center right: #631/ P Inscribed in black ink and (graphite) in stamp at lower right: DRAWING (923311)/ SCALE (1 1/2" = 1'-0")/ STOCK (1631)/ MATERIALS (BRUSHED ALUM'N)/DATE (SEPT. 23/31) RECORD OF PRINTS/ DATE (12/29) NO (3) SENT TO (2TcGNPT)/DATE (1/12/30) NO (1) SENT TO (CNPT)/ DATE (2/26) NO (1) SENT TO (ALCOA)

Drawing, "Sidechair".
graphite, red color pencil, ruled border in graphite
